package org.jscience.mathematics.geometry
Provides the org.jscience.mathematics.geometry module.

    A point in 2D Euclidean space. * @author Silvere Martin-Michiellot

    Represents an N-dimensional point.

    Represents a ray in 2D space.
    Ray3D
    Represents a ray in 3D space defined by an origin and a direction.

    Represents a ray in N-dimensional space defined by an origin and a direction. * @author Silvere Martin-Michiellot
    RegionBSPTree
    Represents a region in 3D space using a Binary Space Partitioning (BSP) tree.
    RegionBSPTree3D
    Represents a region in 3D space using a Binary Space Partitioning (BSP) tree.

    Represents a line segment in 2D space.
    Segment3D
    Represents a line segment in 3D space.
    SegmentND
    Represents an N-dimensional line segment.
    Vector2D
    A 2D vector in Euclidean space. * @author Silvere Martin-Michiellot
    Vector3D
    Represents a 3D vector.
    VectorND
    Represents an N-dimensional geometric vector.
